Reference¶

Release:0.6
Date:Jan 13, 2017

Warning

This “Reference” is still a work in progress; some of the material is not organized, and several aspects of MEGARA DRP are not yet covered sufficient detail.

  • megaradrp.core — Base classes for processing
  • megaradrp.instrument — Static configuration
  • megaradrp.instrument.configs — Static configuration
  • megaradrp.processing.wavecalibration —
  • megaradrp.products — Data products of the MEGARA pipeline
  • megaradrp.recipes — Reduction Recipes for MEGARA
  • megaradrp.simulation — Simulation modules
